metadata.dc:author: Ramírez-Ojeda, J
Morales, M E
Mendoza, A M
metadata.dc:description: Presentation is made of a case in a premature newborn, the offspring of a mother with bilateral pulmonary tuberculosis, of placental lesions suggestive of tuberculosis and acute miliary congenital tuberculosis with lesions in liver, spleen, lymph nodes and lungs due to a possible blood stream dissemination starting from the placental infection.
metadata.dc:title: Tuberculosis congénita. Descripción de un caso
[Congenital tuberculosis. Description of a case].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
